backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with product, vendor, order, discount, cart, and user profile types, plus maps for storing them and authorization helpers using AccessControl and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and test IDs for role-removal changes, AdminBypass, and admin dashboard rebuild.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing functionality and styling of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documents February 2026 production build fixes involving Vite env vars, missing configs, and added type declarations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that sets metadata, manifest, app icons, and loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest declaring app name, colors, icons, categories, and display settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Custom offline fallback page with gradient styling and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, offline fallback, and cache cleanup with network-first and cache-first strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app layout and full routing tree with customer, vendor, and admin protected routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminError: React error boundary for admin pages that logs errors and shows a diagnostic fallback UI with copyable details.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with top and bottom navigation and a styled layout container.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied UI with optional admin tools, diagnostic error info, and actions to refresh or assign admin roles.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBypass: Simple wrapper that only checks authentication and redirects unauthenticated users to customer login.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity auth and handles clearing or reattempting sessions.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting newly authenticated users to create a basic profile and saving it through backend queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role-gated wrapper that enforces admin/vendor/customer access, showing loading states or denial screens based on actor and role state.
frontend/src/components/auth/SafeAdminGa: Empty file placeholder for an admin access component.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a mobile bottom navigation bar that adapts links based on customer, vendor, or admin role.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Wrapper around Button that applies a primary gradient style to call‑to‑action buttons.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Displays a product deal card with image, pricing, discount, and optional offer tag.
frontend/src/components/forms/FloatingLa: Input field with floating label behavior using shadcn UI components.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Implements an auto‑rotating hero banner slider with navigation controls and indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Shows a grid of product cards with pricing, discounts, stock status, and add‑to‑cart support.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Badge that displays order status text styled using shared status utility functions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Provides the top navigation bar with search, role‑aware actions, cart info, and responsive layout.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Static vendor dataset with basic shop details for demo or lookup use.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Provides a lightweight hook to read and subscribe to actor query cache state without re-creating the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider with login, logout, identity loading, and status management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user roles, profiles, and various backend interactions using an actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page highlighting QuickBazar’s mission and features with styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays vendor list with outlet status controls and loading states, allowing admins to toggle vendor outlet status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Shows all orders with details and lets admins update order statuses.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides product CRUD operations with a form dialog for creating and editing products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Allows admins to add and remove vendors via a dialog form and vendor list view.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages the user’s shopping cart, including quantity updates, item removal, subtotal calculation, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays all categories with loading skeletons, fetching category data and rendering colored cards linking to each category.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Shows products for a specific category with sorting options and handles empty states using fetched product and category data.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Builds an order summary from cart data and processes order creation, clearing the cart and navigating on success.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation and simulated submission plus cards showing contact methods.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Displays the logged‑in customer's profile and role information in read‑only fields.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Shows the customer's order history with basic details and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Displays the customer's wishlist by fetching wishlist IDs and product data, showing loading skeletons, empty state, or product cards with discounts and stock badges.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero slider, login buttons, featured deals, and feature cards using product data.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Provides a customer login form with validation and stores the entered data before navigating to the vendor list filtered by city.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Collects outlet details, including an image upload with preview and validation, then saves the data and navigates to the vendor dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Shows a simple vendor dashboard summarizing outlet info, vendor data, and a registration success message.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Lists vendors filtered by city from search params, showing empty states or vendor cards with navigation to individual shops.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: Renders a vendor login form with validation and saves the data before navigating to the outlet details step.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Displays vendor details by vendorId, showing location and contact info with a fallback error state if the vendor is not found.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays product details, image carousel, pricing, reviews, and allows adding to cart and submitting reviews.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Shows vendor dashboard stats, orders, and wallet dues, with payment handling and outlet status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Lists vendor orders with status, date, customer info, and totals, with a loading and empty state.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Allows vendors to view, add, edit, and delete products using dialog-based forms tied to backend mutations.
frontend/src/utils/categoryColors.ts: Provides deterministic category-to-color mapping using a hash-based palette index.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Finds a category by case-insensitive name matching.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Extracts readable error messages, formats them for diagnostics, and builds detailed diagnostics text blocks.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats numbers or bigints into INR currency strings with safety guards for invalid inputs.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, and clearing onboarding-related sessionStorage data for customers, vendors, and outlets.
frontend/src/utils/safeNumbers.ts: Provides safe conversions and formatting for bigint and number values to prevent rendering errors.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Provides helper functions to map order/UI/stock statuses to display text and Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing params.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Type definitions for Vite environment variables used in the frontend.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, radius, shadows, and animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the admin dashboard rebuild, required features, and known issues.
